channel.title: The PVP Massacre - EPIC
channel.description:
[CENTER]This [B][I]isnt[/I][/B] the real PvP Massacre! I just could not think of another name...
I just worked on PI when my other pc crashed and i had to recover the real one. I am releasing because PI/Riotscape/Emulous are really bad stability wise...Working on hyperion :coolface:
[B][U]This server's features:[/U][/B]
[QUOTE] - Hyperions event system - Hyperions Background Loader - Hyperions task's - Major bug fixes - FireMaking redone - Agility added - Fixed many more skills - RuneCrafting redone - KillZone minigame added [70% Working] - Fight Pits redone w/ Staking system [Just need objects added] [99% working] - Fixed many interfaces - Converted process into Events - Removed un-needed shit - Removed stuff out of the Player class and made it Static [Combat Constants] - Fixed NO-Clipping by ripping RiotScape 2.0's walking system & object loading system - Fixed some combat bugs eg. Range following & Mage following - Cleaned some of the clan chat - Fixed sanity's SHIT ASS MASS SAVING. WTF WAS IT DOING THERE? It is now an event and saves properly ;) [/QUOTE]
NICK's features:
[QUOTE]I Quote: Client Features:
- Sorry Bear, no anti-leech. - Highly Edited - Context menus over gameframe. (If you want to rip, drawMenu(x, y);.) - Most bug fix's with the client. (Read below for known bugs not fixed.) - 474 Interfaces - A) Fixed Combat Level text for the interface. - B) Fixed piety positioning, GodWars kill count interface, and PC boat text colors. - C) Fixed lunar interface. - Added 2 Custom interfaces and edited some others. (Bank and Char design.) - Added 2 new crowns. (Need to fix server side rights.)(See below, there is a bug with this.) - Fixed the frame99 bug, cheap hack. - Enabled custom items. (Use ItemDef_2 for the definitions.) - Added some models as well, no customs. - Changed the Gui. - Added Lunar Isle/Nietiznot/Jatizco/Warriors Guild/GodWars maps. - Repositioned Gameframes. - Added 459(317), 474, 484, 508, and 525 Gameframe versions. Can toggle which one you want. - Added x10 Damage and new Hitmarks. - Added Stewies new awsome chat engine. - Everything my old release had as well.
- much more, but that's all I can think of at the moment...
Known Bugs:
- Black maps. (Involves method22() in client.java.) - While swithing from 525 gameframe to 459(317) the chatarea doesn't update until you click or right-click. - The 459(317) Compass is positioned wrong I believe. - The clicking for the tabs and for the chatarea for the 459(317) gameframe is off. (Might post a fix if I get around to it.) - That's it for now.
Server Features:
- Probably most edited PI server released?(Next to NBK.) - Fixed a few things. - Can't remember the rest... [/QUOTE]
- All features that NICKname's source had [/CENTER]
[B][U]Server DL:[/U][/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qawzhdthfnw][PI] - PVP PLANET -.zip[/url] [B][U]Client DL:[/U][/B] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?umtjjxmntzz]317 Client.rar[/url]
[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B]
40% Sanity 10% NICKname 10% Jinrake 30% Lmctruck 10% Hyperion's developer team
[size=24pt][u][b]I AM JINRAKE.[/b][/u][/size]

item.title: The PVP Massacre - EPIC
item.dc:creator: @Flame_pkz Flame pkz
item.description:
@Flame_pkz wrote:

[CENTER]This isnt the real PvP Massacre! I just could not think of another name…

I just worked on PI when my other pc crashed and i had to recover the real one.
I am releasing because PI/Riotscape/Emulous are really bad stability wise…Working on hyperion :coolface:

This server’s features:

  • Hyperions event system
  • Hyperions Background Loader
  • Hyperions task’s
  • Major bug fixes
  • FireMaking redone
  • Agility added
  • Fixed many more skills
  • RuneCrafting redone
  • KillZone minigame added [70% Working]
  • Fight Pits redone w/ Staking system [Just need objects added] [99% working]
  • Fixed many interfaces
  • Converted process into Events
  • Removed un-needed shit
  • Removed stuff out of the Player class and made it Static [Combat Constants]
  • Fixed NO-Clipping by ripping RiotScape 2.0’s walking system & object loading system
  • Fixed some combat bugs eg. Range following & Mage following
  • Cleaned some of the clan chat
  • Fixed sanity’s SHIT ASS MASS SAVING. WTF WAS IT DOING THERE? It is now an event and saves properly

NICK’s features:

[QUOTE]I Quote:
Client Features:

  • Sorry Bear, no anti-leech.

  • Highly Edited

  • Context menus over gameframe. (If you want to rip, drawMenu(x, y);.)

  • Most bug fix’s with the client. (Read below for known bugs not fixed.)

  • 474 Interfaces

  • A) Fixed Combat Level text for the interface.

  • B) Fixed piety positioning, GodWars kill count interface, and PC boat text colors.

  • C) Fixed lunar interface.

  • Added 2 Custom interfaces and edited some others. (Bank and Char design.)

  • Added 2 new crowns. (Need to fix server side rights.)(See below, there is a bug with this.)

  • Fixed the frame99 bug, cheap hack.

  • Enabled custom items. (Use ItemDef_2 for the definitions.)

  • Added some models as well, no customs.

  • Changed the Gui.

  • Added Lunar Isle/Nietiznot/Jatizco/Warriors Guild/GodWars maps.

  • Repositioned Gameframes.

  • Added 459(317), 474, 484, 508, and 525 Gameframe versions. Can toggle which one you want.

  • Added x10 Damage and new Hitmarks.

  • Added Stewies new awsome chat engine.

  • Everything my old release had as well.

  • much more, but that’s all I can think of at the moment…

Known Bugs:

  • Black maps. (Involves method22() in client.java.)
  • While swithing from 525 gameframe to 459(317) the chatarea doesn’t update until you click or right-click.
  • The 459(317) Compass is positioned wrong I believe.
  • The clicking for the tabs and for the chatarea for the 459(317) gameframe is off. (Might post a fix if I get around to it.)
  • That’s it for now.

Server Features:

  • Probably most edited PI server released?(Next to NBK.)

  • Fixed a few things.

  • Can’t remember the rest… [/QUOTE]

  • All features that NICKname’s source had
    [/CENTER]
